item.title: Deploy your own blog for free using Hugo + GitHub Pages + GitHub Action
item.description: Table of Contents Immediately useful links Background links Source code for this blog lives on master branch here. The actual assets for the website live on the gh-pages branch here and is posted automatically via the GitHub Action here. Immediately useful links hugo-clarity theme hugo-clarity github repo GitHub Action for setting up Hugo make sure to do “Hugo extended version” GitHub Action for deploying to GitHub Pages make sure to enable manual deployments to enable debugging make sure to point to gh-pages branch in repo settings for GitHub Pages Background links GitHub docs about creating GitHub Pages Hugo Themes Hugo Quick Start Docs
